example.parse: (NEG_PART ما)) (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3MS زال) (NP-SBJ-2 (NP (NOUN صُنْدُوق) (NP (DET+NOUN النَقْد))) (CONJ وِ) (NP (DET+NOUN البَنْك) (DET+ADJ الدَوْلِي))) (S (S (VP (IV3MS+IV يِبْحَث) (NP-SBJ-1 (-NONE- *-2)) (PP (PREP فِي) (NP (NOUN اِقْتِصاد) (NP (POSS_PRON_1P نا)))))) (CONJ وِ) (S (VP (IV3MS+IV يِسْتَعْمَر) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *-1)) (NP-OBJ (IVSUFF_DO:1P نا)) (PP (PREP مِن) (NP (ADJ جِدِيد)))))
